00010 int findObjectID(MavenCompiler* c, int namespaceID, string objectName) {
00011         smartAssertMessage(namespaceID >= 0,
00012                                            "namespaceID = %d", namespaceID);
00013         
00014         smartAssertMessage(namespaceID < c->namespaces->length(),
00015                                            "namespaceID = %d, c->namespaces.length() = %d",
00016                                            namespaceID, c->namespaces->length());
00017         
00018         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->length(); ++i)
00019                 if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(i)->name == objectName)
00020                         return i;
00021         
00022         return -1;
00023 }
